extendedInfo.description: Real Racing 3 sets a new standard for mobile racing games â it really must be experienced to be believed.**This is a highly detailed game of superior quality. Please make sure you have at least 1.2GB of free space on your device.**Featuring a wide variety of officially licensed tracks, an expanded 22-car grid, and over 50 meticulously detailed cars from makers like Porsche, Lamborghini, Dodge, Bugatti, and Audi. Plus, racing against friends becomes even easier with the advanced Time Shifted Multiplayerâ¢ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere on smartphone and tablet devices! REAL CARSFeaturing Real Racingâs largest roster of cars yet, donât miss our new manufacturers like Porsche, Lamborghini, Dodge, Bugatti, and Audi. Take the wheels of over 50 intensely detailed racers and test your skills on an authentic 22-car race grid â for the first time on mobileREAL TRACKSIn another first for the Real Racing series, burn rubber on a full lineup of real tracks in multiple configurations from top locations around the world, including Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca, Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps, Silverstone, Hockenheimring, and many more.REAL PEOPLELike nothing youâve seen before, our innovative new Time Shifted Multiplayerâ¢ lets you race anyone, anytime â even if theyâre offline! Every career event is filled with fully interactive AI-controlled time-shifted versions of your Facebook friends, as well as other players from around the world.M MORE CHOICES THAN EVERCompete in over 1000 events like cup races, eliminations, endurance challenges, and drag races. Upgrade your car parts to maximize performance. See the action through a variety of camera angles and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCEPowered by the remarkable new Mintâ¢ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features persistent car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for a super-enhanced racing reality. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all.Welcome to the definitive racing experience for everyone, everywhere.NOTE:Your saved progress will be lost if you remove this game from your device.YOU MUST BE 13+ TO PLAY. ACCEPTANCE OF END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT, EA PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE REQUIRED TO PLAY. EA ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE CAN BE FOUND AT www.ea.com.EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON www.ea.com/1/services-updates

reviews.title: Buggy & may as well be a paid app
reviews.comment: So. To my surprise I went to go and use my latest purchased car but it wasn\'t there! I did at least ten races last night to purchase this car,  received the notification of delivery, did a couple races today before going to use my latest purchase and poof. It\'s gone. Now I\'m going to have to do all those races again and wait another eight hours for for this vehicle because let\'s be real here--gold is hard to come by for instant delivery and I prefer not to pay for games that are advertised as free.
reviews.author: Andrew E

reviews.title: Messed with phone
reviews.comment: Every time I go play and turn the volume all the way down and I exit it locks my ringtone volume my notifications every volume its the only app I had that dose it I even reinstall it
reviews.author: pielover771

reviews.comment: I used to play the game frequently but then it crashed.so i reinstalled it. But now every time it goes to the loadind screen it says insufficient storage so i deleted all the app i dont need so i have 1.5 GB unused but it still says that
reviews.author: Hallan Jeanmary

reviews.title: I am disappoint
reviews.comment: 10,000,000 mb downloaded after initial installation, no longer works on my Xperia lte
reviews.author: Paul Wieler

reviews.title: Controls
reviews.comment: Nexus 7 2, I have noticed increasing times that the accelerator and brake are not disengaging when I lift my R\'s from the screen. Even worse are the times that one or the other do not work at all with several taps on the screen.
reviews.author: Mike Gardner

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Ok first off.  Every time you release a new update with new cars and series you cant even play with them because you to unlock it first.  Pointless i woild have to do like 500 races to get to the point where i could use ghe Porsches.  Thanks guys

reviews.comment: Noope nothin....wont work g2

reviews.comment: This game dont work no more. When I open the game it loads but then crashes. Fix it

reviews.comment: Keeps crashing at random points in the game on my s3 did not have that issue with the previous update....

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Best race game

reviews.title: Quick fix for 2013 nexus 7 res
reviews.comment: Using the screen rotation lock app I\'ve been able to actually enjoy the gaming experience. Adding the the rr3 gfx app just makes it all the better!
reviews.author: Thomas Nichols

reviews.title: Idk
reviews.comment: I updated it and it wont open it will go to da blue screen then click off...its been doi g this before I updated it...I was able to play it before but now idk .....uuugghh
reviews.author: Brat Baby

reviews.title: Won\'t Update on Cell Network
reviews.comment: The game \'strongly recommends\' I connect to WiFi to update and refuses to let me update on a cellular connection. I don\'t need an app telling me how to use my data. Remind me I\'m on a cell connection and do it anyway!  Also, the game doesn\'t recognize a Bluetooth tether connection as being connected to a network.
reviews.author: Erik Wilhelm

reviews.title: Was a 5! Now at best a 2
reviews.comment: Was a 5 then a 2 then back to five again! Now a 2 yet again! I hate the fact that I was just about to buy a car then suddenly I was out of reach! I had the money but I had to do several races with other cars I needed to buy first that I had no interest in doing at the time. Just to get the car I did want to use!
reviews.author: James Kyes

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Its a great game great graphics real driving amazing overall.
reviews.author: Kalvin Carruthers

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Please I beg of you guys give Nvidia Shield support, great job guys love the game
reviews.author: steven wright

reviews.title: Really Good
reviews.comment: Great game. Works great on my Galaxy note II and Nvidia Shield. The only wish I have now is to add controller support on the shield and it would be perfect.
reviews.author: Vladimir Edelman

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is so fun and realistic.  People if your volume gets locked. All you have to do is kill or stop the app
reviews.author: Tony Harris

reviews.title: Great game top all time
reviews.comment: This is one of the best racing games I have ever  played on my phone. Droid DNA. The controls are AWESOME and there are so many races you can play as long as you want. So when you finally do get up to those Porsche levels you will be happy for some more updates. \"Remember there\'s levels to this ****\".
reviews.author: chris briggs

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I love the game. It plays amazing on my and looks excellent. I just wish you guys would put the car buying experience back to the way it used to be. If the credits are available, we should be able to purchase what we want. Instead of having to level up about 20 times. I really hope you guys will consider a fix. I really enjoy this game.
reviews.author: Daniel Brezina
